title: Full stack developer / Siri voice builder
description: Enhanced team's productivity and visibility over important data & processes by building and implementing new internal full-stack applications
Developed application data model (Postgres), setup scalable data pipelines
Collaborated with other engineers to develop internal microservices with Express.js & Flask, to setup authentication & authorization mechanisms, and deploy dockerized apps to Kubernetes
Created reusable React components library & custom hooks to save the development time. Covered UI components with unit tests using Jest and Testing library
Wrote comprehensive docs describing new internal tools architecture for easier maintenance, feature implementation, collaboration, and onboarding
Improved the quality of Russian voices of Siri; built and pushed new voices to production

title: Web Developer
description: Developed performant and accessible websites and web apps for small businesses with WordPress, Javascript (React, Next) and Python (Django)
Improved existing React projects by refactoring, building custom React hooks to make the app's logic reusable which resulted in 2x faster new feature implementation
